title: taliya buffs suggestion
body:
She not very good... so here's what I suggest. Nothing about ap dmgs or ratio on her abilities like riot is used to.

Q into the circles : Shots 1-2-3 times at level 1-3-5 instead of just 1 shot when she stands in the circles (still 5 shots when outside)

W : allow taliya to w on her allies (if hit by her e heals instead of damaging) and allow her to w allies over walls (#LCSBIGPLAYS)

Just those 2 small changes would make her more viable especiallu as a support

replies.body:
That W change would make her a completely different champion.

If a change like the one you suggested for her Q were to go through, the damage on it would need some nerfs.  There would be hardly any negative to using the Q on worked ground.

I don't think she needs buffs, especially not major ones like those.

She's quite strong when played well, and her winrate has come up to just under 50% this patch.

Wait for people to get more practice and get better at her.
